findings.message:
ApprovalChain.removeEntry(StarkExTypes.ApprovalChainData,address) (ApprovalChain.sol#441-466) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool,string)(block.timestamp >= unlockedForRemovalTime,REMOVAL_NOT_ENABLED_YET) (ApprovalChain.sol#453)
findings.name: timestamp

findings.message:
ApprovalChain.announceRemovalIntent(StarkExTypes.ApprovalChainData,address,uint256) (ApprovalChain.sol#428-439) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool,string)(block.timestamp + removalDelay > block.timestamp,INVALID_REMOVAL_DELAY) (ApprovalChain.sol#434)
findings.name: timestamp
